dmca.title: Bhaktivedanta Book Trust Requests DMCA Takedown of Images
dmca.body:
The Bhaktivedanta Book Trust

Founder-Acharya: His Divine Grace A. C. BHaklivedanta Swami Prabhupada
[private], Los Angeles, CA 90034 - Ph: xxx-xxx-xxxx 
Fax: xxx-xxx-xxxx

NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT (in accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act)

TO: Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

3/23/04

ISSUED BY: Bhaktivedanta Book Trust International

Copyrights and Legal Matters Department 
[private],
Los Angeles, CA 90034, USA 
Phone: (xxx) xxx-xxxx - Fax: (xxx) xxx-xxxx - E-mail: [private]@pamho.net
Web: http://www.bbti.org

REGARDING: Vahini.org - registrant contact email: [private]@is.nl, [private]@is.nl

ATTENTION: To the editors and legal counsel of Google.com

1) NOTICE is hereby given that the website Vahini.org and its owners are actively engaging in copyright infringement of our works. Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, we urge you, upon receiving effective written notification of this claim, to promptly remove or disable access to this web site being featured on Google's server under the following search queries:

	Search Queries: "Bhagavan Sai Baba books" and "vahinis of sai baba"
	Infringing Web Pages:	www.vahini.org/links/sailinks.html
					www.vahini.org/contents.html
					vahini.org/

2) A REPRESENTATIVE LIST of copyrighted works this site is infringing on, illegally using, or bootlegging and / or selling without our permission includes: Hundreds of our copyrighted images.

3) SPECIFIC INCIDENTS of copyright infringement: http://www.vahini.org/bhagavata/bhagavata.html 
The main picture of Radha-Krishna is our BBT artwork, used without permission. 
http://www.vahini.org/bhagavata/chapter5.html -The two pictures on this page are from the BBT
